Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Fullerton
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Fullerton, Sacramento and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Fullerton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Grand/Franklin
ShortDescription: Eastbound 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Orleans, Ohio, Wells then resuming route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Franklin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Orleans, Ohio, Wells then resume their normal route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Franklin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red and Purple Line Service Delayed Addison
ShortDescription: Red and Purple Line trains are standing at Addison  due to a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to a minor fire at track level.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Belmont to Howard to provide connecting service through the affected area.  At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
